text:
Jukka Mikkola (3 July 1943 – 23 March 2018) was a Finnish politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party. He was a lawyer and has the title Master of Laws. He continued as the second deputy speaker of the parliament for the remaining term 1999-2003.
Mikkola died after a long illness on 23 March 2018, aged 74.
